tasks.task_description: Initialize Next.js 14+ project with TypeScript, App Router, Tailwind CSS, and ESLint/Prettier configuration
Set up Prisma ORM with PostgreSQL schema for User, Course, CourseModule, Order, Subscription, UserProgress models
Configure NextAuth.js with Google, Facebook, GitHub social providers and JWT session handling
Create core API routes for authentication, user management, and session handling
Set up content processing system with gray-matter, remark, and remark-html for markdown rendering
Build course management API endpoints with CRUD operations, filtering, and search functionality
Develop course catalog UI with filtering, search, and responsive course cards
Implement shopping cart functionality with Zustand state management and session persistence
Integrate Razorpay payment gateway with UPI, cards, bank transfer support and webhook handling
Build order management system with status tracking and automatic course access granting
Implement subscription management with tier-based access control and billing cycle handling
Create course player interface with markdown rendering, module navigation, and progress tracking
Build user progress tracking system with completion status and resume functionality
Develop admin dashboard for course creation, editing, publishing, and content management
Set up AWS CDK infrastructure with ECS Fargate, RDS PostgreSQL, S3, and CloudFront CDN
Configure Redis ElastiCache for session caching and performance optimization
Implement comprehensive error handling, logging, and user-friendly error messages
Write unit tests for API routes, components, and utilities with Jest and React Testing Library
Create end-to-end tests for critical user flows with Playwright
Set up CI/CD pipeline with GitHub Actions, automated testing, and deployment to academy.cloudnestle.com

description: Implementation of CloudNestle Academy Platform - Complete learning management system with Next.js 14+, authentication, course management, payments, subscriptions, and AWS infrastructure
